title: Create a Theme with CSS Variables
description:
Build a simple theming system using CSS custom properties.

## Requirements

1. Define these variables on `:root`:
   - `--primary-color`: #3498db
   - `--secondary-color`: #2ecc71
   - `--text-color`: #333333
   - `--background-color`: #ffffff
   - `--border-radius`: 8px

2. Style the `.card` using the variables:
   - Background: var(--background-color)
   - Border: 1px solid using var(--primary-color)
   - Border radius: var(--border-radius)
   - Padding: 20px

3. Style the `.card-title`:
   - Color: var(--primary-color)

4. Style the `.button`:
   - Background: var(--secondary-color)
   - Color: white
   - Border radius: var(--border-radius)

## Expected Result

A card and button styled using CSS variables.
